rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: But Fukuda, and one of his former colleagues from the CDC, Tim Uyeki, think at this point the world would be better off focusing on spillover threats plural than one single type of bird flu.
